hadith.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri that a man came to the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) and said:"O Messenger of Allah! Which of the people is best?" He said: "One who strives with himself and his wealth in the cause of Allah." He said: "Then who, O Messenger of Allah?" He said: "Then a believer (isolating himself) in one of the mountain passes, who fears Allah and spares the people his evil
